data.comment: The big names in today's match at Kazan Arena have now been confirmed.
The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Rubin Kazan with the kick-off.
In the minute 1, Sergei Ivanov signals a Lokomotiv Moscow throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half.
Goal! Aleksey Miranchuk gives Lokomotiv Moscow a 0-1 lead in Kazan.
Dmitry Rybchinskiy with an assist there.
In the minute 3, Can Rubin Kazan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kazan.
In the minute 5, Throw-in for Rubin Kazan at Kazan Arena.
Sergei Ivanov awards the away team a throw-in.
Lokomotiv Moscow to take a throw-in in Rubin Kazan territory.
In the minute 7, In Kazan Rubin Kazan drive forward through Ivan Ignatyev. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
In the minute 9, Filip Uremovic (Rubin Kazan) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Sergei Ivanov awards Lokomotiv Moscow a goal kick.
Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 10, Goal kick for Lokomotiv Moscow at Kazan Arena.
In Kazan, Soltmurad Bakaev of Rubin Kazan is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 12, Khvicha Kvaratskhelia (Rubin Kazan) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Rubin Kazan goal kick.
In the minute 15, Lokomotiv Moscow's Dmitry Rybchinskiy is on target but unsuccessful.
Can Lokomotiv Moscow capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Rubin Kazan's half?
Sergei Ivanov signals a throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow, close to Rubin Kazan's area.
In the minute 17, Rubin Kazan have a goal kick.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
Rubin Kazan's Carl Starfelt breaks free at Kazan Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 19, Lokomotiv Moscow have a goal kick.
Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 21, Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
Rubin Kazan push forward at Kazan Arena and Khvicha Kvaratskhelia gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Lokomotiv Moscow defence.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 22, Important block from the Lokomotiv Moscow defence as Darko Jevtic fires in a strike for Rubin Kazan.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
In the minute 24, Goal kick for Lokomotiv Moscow at Kazan Arena.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 26, Goal! Lokomotiv Moscow extend their lead to 0-2 through Dmitri Barinov.
Great play from Dmitry Rybchinskiy to set up the goal.
Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
In the minute 30, Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Rubin Kazan in Kazan.
In the minute 36, Sergei Ivanov awards Lokomotiv Moscow a goal kick.
Lokomotiv Moscow pushes forward through Grzegorz Krychowiak, whose finish on goal is saved.
Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
In the minute 39, Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
In the minute 43, Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, It's Lokomotiv Moscow with the kick-off after the break.
Silvije Begic is on a sub for Ilya Samoshnikov for Rubin Kazan.
Rubin Kazan to take a throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow territory.
In the minute 47, Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in their own half.
At Kazan Arena, Dmitry Rybchinskiy has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 49, Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Rubin Kazan's Ivan Ignatyev has been booked in Kazan.
In the minute 51, Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Sergei Ivanov signals a Rubin Kazan throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half.
In Kazan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 53, Ball goes out of play for a Lokomotiv Moscow goal kick.
Ball safe as Lokomotiv Moscow is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Rubin Kazan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 55, Lokomotiv Moscow awarded a free kick in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Kazan to check on Dmitri Barinov, who is grimacing with pain.
Dmitri Barinov is back on the pitch.
In the minute 57, Rubin Kazan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Rubin Kazan!
In the minute 59, Rubin Kazan's Darko Jevtic gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kazan.
Dmitrii Zhivoglyadov (Lokomotiv Moscow) has received a yellow card from Sergei Ivanov.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
In the minute 61, Ivan Ignatyev of Rubin Kazan gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kazan.
Can Rubin Kazan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half?
In the minute 62, Throw-in Lokomotiv Moscow.
The home team replace Igor Konovalov with Djordje Despotovic.
The home team have replaced Soltmurad Bakaev with Denis Makarov. This is the third substitution made today by Leonid Slutskiy.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
Rubin Kazan have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 64, Can Rubin Kazan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lokomotiv Moscow's half?
Filip Uremovic for Rubin Kazan has been booked by Sergei Ivanov and receives a first yellow card.
Silvije Begic (Rubin Kazan) has been shown a straight red card by referee Sergei Ivanov.
In the minute 66, Free kick Lokomotiv Moscow.
Lokomotiv Moscow's Dmitry Rybchinskiy gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Rubin Kazan defender.
Fedor Smolov of Lokomotiv Moscow is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 68, Goal kick for Rubin Kazan at Kazan Arena.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan.
Rubin Kazan's Djordje Despotovic misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 69, Sergei Ivanov awards Lokomotiv Moscow a goal kick.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Rubin Kazan in their own half.
Lokomotiv Moscow make their first substitution with Vladislav Ignatev replacing Dmitry Rybchinskiy.
In the minute 71, In Kazan a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Important block from the Rubin Kazan defence as Fedor Smolov fires in a strike for Lokomotiv Moscow.
Ball goes out of play for a Rubin Kazan goal kick.
In the minute 72, Zurab Davitashvili is replacing Khvicha Kvaratskhelia for the home team.
Lokomotiv Moscow are caught offside.
Denis Makarov of Rubin Kazan smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 75, Corner awarded to Rubin Kazan.
Darko Jevtic for Rubin Kazan drives towards goal at Kazan Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Rubin Kazan have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Rubin Kazan close to the penalty box.
Marko Nikolic (Lokomotiv Moscow) is making a second substitution, with Stanislav Magkeev replacing Rifat Zhemaletdinov.
Ball safe as Rubin Kazan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 78, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Rubin Kazan close to the penalty box.
Dmitri Barinov is booked for the away team.
Lokomotiv Moscow have a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Lokomotiv Moscow needs to be cautious. Rubin Kazan have an attacking throw-in.
Dmitri Tarasov is replacing Ivan Ignatyev for Rubin Kazan at Kazan Arena.
Sergei Ivanov signals a Lokomotiv Moscow throw-in in Rubin Kazan's half.
In the minute 84, Grzegorz Krychowiak for Lokomotiv Moscow gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Kazan.
Lokomotiv Moscow have a goal kick.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Lokomotiv Moscow in their own half.
In the minute 85, Denis Makarov (Rubin Kazan) has received a yellow card from Sergei Ivanov.
Sergei Ivanov awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 86, Lokomotiv Moscow to take a throw-in in Rubin Kazan territory.
Free kick for Rubin Kazan in the half of Lokomotiv Moscow.
Stanislav Magkeev (Lokomotiv Moscow) gets a yellow card.
Lokomotiv Moscow have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Sergei Ivanov signals a throw-in for Lokomotiv Moscow, close to Rubin Kazan's area.
At Kazan Arena the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Rubin Kazan.
Throw-in for Rubin Kazan at Kazan Arena.
Sergei Ivanov blows to end the match. The final score is 0-2.
Nikita Iosifov is replacing Dmitri Barinov for the away team.
Marko Nikolic is making the team's fourth substitution at Kazan Arena with Mikhail Ageev replacing Fedor Smolov.
Marko Nikolic (Lokomotiv Moscow) is making a fifth substitution, with Daniil Kulikov replacing Maciej Rybus.
Nikita Iosifov for Lokomotiv Moscow has been booked by Sergei Ivanov and receives a first yellow card.
